org.eclipse.scada.configuration.world.osgi

Interface EventLogger

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ItemFeatureEntry
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EventLoggerImpl

    public interface EventLogger
extends ItemFeatureEntry
    A representation of the model object 'Event Logger'.

    The following features are supported:

    • Log Attributes Change
    • Log Value Change
    • Log Subscription Change
    • Log Writes

    See Also:
    OsgiPackage.getEventLogger()
